RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 31 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINCESS HALIME stumbled at the start, circled rivals three wide through the far turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch and drew off under strong handling. RIGHT TRAPPE pressed the pace along the inside through the first turn, made the lead before a half, set the pace to the top of the stretch then was no match for the winner. LIBERTY BELLE vied for the lead three wide, drew on near even terms for the lead two wide approaching the quarter pole then was outfinished. SOMUCHSUGAR under strong restraint early, lacked the needed response. BOURBON BUNS was outrun. NINJA KITTEN set the early pace and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Halime
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, circled 3 wide 2nd turn, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Right Trappe
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, led, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, loomed boldly 2 wide, 1/4p, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Buns
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Somuchsugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: under strong restraint early, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Ninja Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE MAY 31, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 31 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,5 00.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLASSIC MO away alertly, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and won under confident handling. SWEET LEMON DROP chased the winner from the inside through the turn, shifted to the four path at the top of the stretch and held on for second. NAMBITI wide early, angled in on the turn then finished well along the rail. JUDGE HEAD stalked the pace three wide and went evenly. OFTEN ENOUGH failed to menace. ROLLIN ON TEQUILA chased the winner two wide into the turn then gave way. ROLLIN ON TEQUILA DISQUALIFIED PER ADMC PROGRAM RULES FOR POSITIVE TEST, CASE 2023-00457.

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, widened lane, confident handling

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Lemon Drop
ENTRY.OWNER: Samuel Klein Jr LLC and Aurora Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside, shifted 4path top lane, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Often Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Rollin On Tequila
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, gave way turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Judge Head
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Nambiti
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide early, angled in turn, finished well rail

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 23600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $12,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Si nce March 31 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED HOT LASS away alertly, set the pace off the rail in the four path while getting quick fractions, drifted to the six path at the top of the stretch and drew off under strong handling to win as much the best. TIZ INDEPENDENCE bumped at the start, checked along the inside midway on the far turn, shifted out to the eight path entering the stretch, came on again and got up for second. SPECIAL BEACH stalked the pace and was outfinished for second. KINGSTON TIME pressured the winner two wide while hung out in the five path then faded. FIONA was no threat. MAOILIN bumped at the start and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, fast pace off rail, drifted 6path, much the best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pope McLean, Marc McLean, Pope McLeanJr. & Taproot Bloodst

ENTRY.NAME: Fiona
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Special Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, outfinished for second

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Independence
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, checked inside 2nd turn, shifted 8p, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Maoilin
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Kingston Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide 2nd turn, faded,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 34. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TITEBLUEJEANS trailed early, circled rivals three wide into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker and drew off under a strong hand ride. MANDOLIN BREEZE pressed the pace three then two wide and finished second best inside the winner. HALO EFFECT was bumped at the start, moved up near the inside midway on the turn then failed to sustain that bid. MISS MARY JEAN sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace through the turn then was used up. MOST ADORABLE stumbled inward out of the gate bumping HALO EFFECT, pressed the pace two wide, clipped heels entering the turn, stumbled nearly unseating her rider then dropped out of it.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mary Jean
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Urieta Johanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace inside, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Halo Effect
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, middle move, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Most Adorable
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled, bumped start, clipped heels 3/8 pole, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Mandolin Breeze
ENTRY.OWNER: Emerson Equistions LLC and Bestard Brian
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, inside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Titebluejeans
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly, 3 wide, drew off, hand ride

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 101. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 23600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $12,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Rac e Since March 31 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOHN'S ROCK pressed the pace two wide while racing in the four path, assumed the lead entering the far turn, drifted to the middle of the racetrack in upper stretch and won under strong handling. OAKS HONEY never far back, moved closer three wide on the far turn and finished second best. FAT DADDY unhurried early, loomed boldly two wide into the stretch then was outfinished for second. LAZARUS PROJECT trailed early, advanced in the five path into the far turn then leveled off. DISCLOSURE failed to menace. FIRST CITIZEN sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, dropped to the rail, set the pace for five and one half furlongs then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Oaks Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Disclosure
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Fat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, loomed boldly 2 wide top lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Lazarus Project
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move 5path, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: John's Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 4path, assumed command 3/8p, drifted mid track, driving

ENTRY.NAME: First Citizen
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace 3/8 pole, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 46. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 31 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 OrLess Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANIMO ROBERTO unhurried for five furlongs, closed ground three wide through the far turn and into the stretch, was struck twice with a right handed whip before the furlong marker and got up in the final strides under a strong hand ride. MARCH MAGIC settled in a stalking position outside, surged two wide on the far turn, gained a narrow advantage nearing the top of the stretch, matched strides to the wire and just missed hanging on. PLAYING BALL broke in front, set the pace for six furlongs, dueled the balance of the trip and was outfinished in a game effort. CASUAL ATTIRE allowed to settle, moved up along the inside into the stretch then leveled off. THE GOSPEL OF MARK was no factor. SWEET JILL'S JACK pressed the pace along the inside into the far turn then gave way. ATILANO'S THUNDER broke slowly, rushed to contention, pressed the pace three wide and was through after a half. MUSIC GEM hit the gate, broke in tangle causing his rider to lose his irons, lost contact with his field and was distanced. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Playing Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace upper stretch, dueled, outfinished gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Jill's Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Atilano's Thunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, rushed to contention, pressed 3w, through half

ENTRY.NAME: The Gospel of Mark
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: March Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside, surged 2nd turn, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Animo Roberto
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed 3w, up in final strides, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Music Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate, broke in tangle, lost irons, distanced, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Casual Attire
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, leveled off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 35. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I'M JAC'D stalked the pace through the turn, rallied three wide wo make the lead in upper stretch and finished full of run under brisk handling to win going away. RATATAT saved ground through the turn, shifted two wide in deep stretch and rallied for second. BOLD NICKY away alertly, set the pace along the inside into the stretch then was outfinished. POLLY PRISSY PANTS went evenly. HAPPYBDAYMRPREZ offered a mild bid three wide on the turn then failed to sustain that bid. WAY OF THE WORLD was no factor. THE KID'S PRAYER hit the gate and broke inward then was outrun. SHESANOTHERSONG pressed the pace two with through the turn then was used up. MY TWO JAKES had brief speed. GHOSTLY REVIVAL stumbled unseating her rider at the start. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: The Kid's Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate, broke inward, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Jac'd
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Jakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostly Revival
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled, lost jockey start, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Nicky
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Ratatat
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground turn, shifted 2 wide late, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Shesanothersong
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Way of the World
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Happybdaymrprez
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Polly Prissy Pants
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 31 Allowed 4 lbs. (O hio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RELISH THE RIDE allowed to settle, began to close ground in the four path into the stretch, lacked racing room, altered course six wide nearing the furlong marker and got up in the final strides. EXONERATED PREZ never far back, rallied five wide into the stretch, made the lead near the furlong marker then couldn't handle the winner. THE COACHMAN battled for the lead two wide into the stretch and was outfinished in a game effort. UNCLE KEVIN trailed into the stretch and found his best stride late outside. MUTINY stalked the pace into the stretch, loomed boldly four wide and was outfinished. QUIET AMIGO dueled for the lead along the inside into the stretch then weakened late. FIRST SONG failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet Amigo
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Kevin
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, best stride late outside

ENTRY.NAME: The Coachman
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, outfinished gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Exonerated Prez
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed 5 wide, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: First Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Relish the Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, no room upper stretch, altered 6 wide, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Mutiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly 4 wide, outfinished
